title:
San Francisco

I have to say that even after traveling the world and seeing cities like London, Prague...

attachments.displayName:
San Francisco

I have to say that even after traveling the world and seeing cities like London, Prague, Paris, Berlin, Helsinki ... you must add San Francisco to your "Bucket List" of cities to visit in your lifetime. There is no other city in America like "The City." It is mind-boggling how incredibly cool it is!

I spent my youth in Sacramento (about 1.5 hours east) and used to make so many great trips into the Bay Area. It is full of life, museums, culture, otherworldly beauty, mystery, suspense, and filled with all the elements of life that give us peace, serenity, joy, happiness, and hope. You cannot visit from abroad (or from within the USA and only stay a day or two). Give yourself a good week, and you will regret it. It's one of those American cities that simply are the Jewels of the United States of America.

I have a million stories to share with you about my SF adventures (and misadventures) and you will love them. As you will love visiting one of the greatest cities on the planet: San Francisco.

Thinking of +Andrew Coffman +Carter Gibson +Lori Friedrich with this one!

#sanfrancisco   #california   #visiting   #travel   #usatravel   #thebayarea   #adventure   #goldengate   #goldengatebridge 

via/ http://piccsy.com/2012/08/p0is0ne
